datasets.name: 796257f9
queryLines:
SELECT
  *
FROM
 feedback_content_gold
WHERE (array_contains(:content_type, content_type) or array_contains(:content_type, 'All'))

datasets.name: f7c0e188
queryLines:
select
  "Top 10" as title,
  10 as limit
union all
select
  "Top 25",

datasets.name: ae839f8f
queryLines:
select
  content.game_name,
  content.ai_summary,
  content.content_text,
  content.content_type,
  content.translated_content_text,
  content.overall_sentiment,
  content.timestamp,
  sentiment.sentiment,
  sentiment.category,
  sentiment.sub_category
from
  feedback_content_sentiment_gold as sentiment
    inner join feedback_content_gold as content
      on sentiment.content_id = content.content_id
      and sentiment.game_name = content.game_name
WHERE (array_contains(:content_type, content.content_type) or array_contains(:content_type, 'All'))

datasets.name: 934739a7
queryLines:
select
  sentiment.category,
  count(*) as num_neg_contents
from
  feedback_content_sentiment_gold sentiment
    inner join feedback_content_gold as content
      on sentiment.content_id = content.content_id
where
  sentiment.sentiment = "negative"
  and (array_contains(:content_type, content.content_type) or array_contains(:content_type, 'All'))
  and sentiment.game_name = :game_name
  and content.timestamp >= :date_range.min
  and content.timestamp <= :date_range.max
group by
  sentiment.category
order by
  count(*) desc
limit 5

datasets.name: d93acedf
queryLines:
select
  category
from
  feedback_content_sentiment_gold
group by
  category

datasets.name: ce82824a
queryLines:
with x as (
  select
    count(*) as num_of_contents,
    sentiment.sub_category
  from
   feedback_content_sentiment_gold sentiment
    inner join feedback_content_gold as content
      on sentiment.content_id = content.content_id
  where
    content.game_name = :game_name
    and (array_contains(:content_type, content.content_type) or array_contains(:content_type, 'All'))
    and sentiment.category = :category
    and timestamp >= :date_range.min
    and timestamp <= :date_range.max
  group by
    sub_category
  order by
    count(*) desc
  limit CASE
    WHEN :subTopicFilter = 'Top 10' THEN 10
    WHEN :subTopicFilter = 'Top 25' THEN 25
  END
)
select
  count(*) as num_of_contents,
  sentiment.sub_category,
  sentiment.category,
  sentiment.sentiment
from
 feedback_content_sentiment_gold sentiment
    inner join feedback_content_gold as content
      on sentiment.content_id = content.content_id
    inner join x
      on sentiment.sub_category = x.sub_category
where
  content.game_name = :game_name
  and (array_contains(:content_type, content.content_type) or array_contains(:content_type, 'All'))
  and sentiment.category = :category
  and timestamp >= :date_range.min
  and timestamp<= :date_range.max
group by
  sentiment.sub_category,
  sentiment.category,
  sentiment.sentiment

datasets.name: fca51f69
queryLines:
select
  sentiment.category,
  count(*) as num_neg_contents
from
  feedback_content_sentiment_gold sentiment
    inner join feedback_content_gold as content
      on sentiment.content_id = content.content_id
where
  sentiment.sentiment = "positive"
  and sentiment.game_name = :game_name
  and (array_contains(:content_type, content.content_type) or array_contains(:content_type, 'All'))
  and content.timestamp >= :date_range.min
  and content.timestamp <= :date_range.max
group by
  sentiment.category
order by
  count(*) desc
limit 5

frame.title: Top 5 Categories with Highest Negative Sentiment
Top 5 Categories with Highest Positive Sentiment
